about_the_game:
With this DLC you add girl nudity, new erotic illustrations and sexual audio.
The new illustration moves with animation and you can hear the gasping voice.
The girl gets naked. When you complete the game, you can enjoy animation and sound.

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

This game contains explicit consensual sex scenes. The topics cover mainstream pornographic themes, such as but not limited to male/female explicit sex scenes, female/female, vaginal/oral/anal sex, toys, seduction, and consensual BDSM.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
